name: Commodore Commander [LD46]
description:
If youve ever wanted to control the destructive power of a military tank using an oldschool Commodore 64 interface, now you can!

Commodore Commander is a game about an unfortunate mistake which lead to a high-tech tank being equipped with the processor of a 1980s Commodore 64. Its up to you (and a helpful AI bot) to KEEP THIS TANK ALIVE while heading out to patrol a dangerous cyberpunk landscape.

Controls listed and explained in game due to the nature of the game being a bit.. 'different'!

Made for Ludum Dare 46, April 2020

Game Engine: Unity

*Windows and Linux versions now also avaliable 

*Dont fullscreen, its a mess. Best played at 1280x720 only!
